name: Hello Kitty Food Town
storyline:
Hello Kitty wishes to spread love and joy with food and has decided to help you run the day-to-day operations of your little restaurant. Decorate your own Food Town from a broad selection of Hello Kitty-themed furniture, wallpapers, floor tiles, and decors to invite more customers! Serve yummy meals like Little Red Cakes, Mochi, Strawberry Bows, and learn more delectable recipes as you level up! But before anything else, you'll have to grow your very own farm to make sure your ingredients are always fresh!
Using your hard-earned money, upgrade your restaurant's equipment or add tables and chairs to accommodate more diners. Use your shrewd time and resource management skills to keep your customers satisfied.
summary: Welcome to Hello Kitty Food Town! Fulfill your restaurant dreams with Hello Kitty, Keroppi and all their friends! Challenge culinary standards with innovative recipes and keep customers satisfied with your fingerlicking good food!
